WorkItem.Description:
Hello, 
First of all thank you for this wonderful program, I am really happy with it.
There is just one thing thats bothering me - it always takes about 10 minutes to open RAWR for me, even though I have a fast new computer. Is there anything I can do to fix it?

Comments.Message: First I would suggest trying both online and downloadable version to see if there is any difference.

Also see this similar issue http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/21895. Since it seems this is not an isolated case there is some possibility that something in Rawr could be causing this, but without further information we can't really tell.
